Uses of Class
phylo3D.utilities.FatalException

Packages that use FatalException
phylo3D.datafiles This package contains functionality for updating the standard data files.  
phylo3D.parser.ncbi This package contains functionality for parsing the NCBI taxonomy database flatfiles into java objects. 
phylo3D.parser.nexus   
phylo3D.parser.taxonomy   
phylo3D.tools This package contains the tool classes i.e. the classes with main methods called by the user.  
phylo3D.trees This package contains all the main data structure classes i.e. trees and their nodes. 
phylo3D.utilities This package contains various utility functionality: file operations, debug methods and constants.

Uses of FatalException in phylo3D.utilities
 

Subclasses of FatalException in phylo3D.utilities
 class CommandLineException
          Superclass for all command line related exceptions
 class CommandLineInputsException
          Command line exceptions due to errors in the inputs supplied e.g. supplying an option value that is a String instead of an Integer
 class CommandLineParsingException
          Command line exceptions due to errors in the parsing of the command line
 class InputFileAccessException
          Input file access exceptions due to the inability to access an input file whether it be user supplied or not.
 class InvalidInputsException
          Invalid inputs exception due to errors in the inputs to the program that can occur at another level than at the command line
 class MiscellaneousFatalException
          Fatal Exception that does not fit into any of the other classes
 class ObjectIntrospectionException
          Exception that covers the case where the program is not able to introspect an object.
 class OutputFileAccessException
          Exception to be thrown when the program is unable to access an output file for writing to.
 class ProgramInputFileAccessException
          Exception covering the special case where the access problem relaties to an input file that is part of the program, as opposed to supplied by the user.
 class ProgramInputFileParsingException
          Exception due to an error in the parsing of an input file that is part of the program.
 class UserInputFileAccessException
          Special case of the input file access exception where the input file is supplied by the user.
 class UserInputFileParsingException
          Exception thrown if an error occurs in the parsing of a user supplied file
